name: Twilight's Basics: After 6 Years...
description:
You are in 2028, and the Shadowbolts has destroyed Twilight's schoolhouse. So that means that the player is you, Susie! That means Susie has to collect 7 Cutie Marks from the abandoned Schoolhouse before Withered Twilight kills you.

EXTRA CREDITS:

Scratch for most of the sounds
